item.description: config.js module.exports = { ...... head: [ ['script', {}, ` var _hmt = _hmt || []; (function() { var hm = document.createElement("script"); hm.src = "https://hm.baidu.com/hm.js?xxxxxxxxxx"; var s = document.getElementsByTagName("script")[0]; s.parentNode.insertBefore(hm, s); })(); `] ] } 参考 https://www.codeleading.com/article/94892317519/
